externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.

get.summary: Set default values into a new SaleEntity.
get.description:
NetServer calculates default values on the entity, which is required when creating/storing a new instance Calls the Sale agent service CreateDefaultSaleEntity.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

get.summary: OData list of all SaleEntity.
get.description:
Can be sorted and further filtered using OData conventions:

* Sale?$select=col1,col2,abc/col3
* Sale?$filter=col1 eq 'foo' and startswith(col2, 'baz')
* Sale?$orderby=abc/col3,col1
* Sale?$top=1000
* Sale?$mode=full


OData returns XML or JSON carriers depending on the Accept headers.


Calls the Archive service using the "FindSale" archive.


## Filter Operators: ##

ints: eq =, ne, le, lt, gt, ge, set, equals, greater, less, unequals, between

strings: contains, is, notBegins, notContains, isNot

associate: associateIsOneOf, associateIsNotOneOf,  

list ids: oneOf, NotOneOf, 

dates: before, date, after, dateBetween, beforeToday

Unary ops: currentAssociate, beforeToday, today, afterToday, lastWeek, thisWeek, nextWeek, lastMonth, thisMonth, nextMonth, lastQuarter, thisQuarter, nextQuarter, thisHalf, thisYear

Funcs: substringof(a,b), startswith(a,b), endswith(a,b), this(f,period), next(f,n,period), previous(f,n,period), thisAndNext(f,n,period), thisAndPrevious(f,n,period), thisAndPreviousAndNext(f,period)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Comma separated list of column names to return. "nameDepartment,fullname,category". Can also use aggregation functions and modifiers: "Count(category):Footer"

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Expression to restrict the results. e.g.: "name begins 'foo' and category gt 1"

parameters.name: $orderBy
parameters.description: Comma separated list of column names to sort by, with optional direction. "name asc,fullname,category desc"

parameters.name: $entities
parameters.description: Comma separated list of entity names to use. Default = "". "contact, person"

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of rows to return in results

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of rows from database to skip before returning results

parameters.name: $mode
parameters.description: FULL (with raw values and hints for each value) or SLIM (just the display values)

parameters.name: $options
parameters.description: Provider specific options. e.g: "GrandTotal=true"

parameters.name: $context
parameters.description: Provider specific context parameter.

parameters.name: $format
parameters.description: Set XML or JSON output format; override the format determined from Accept header.

parameters.name: $jsonSafe
parameters.description: Make output names into JSON safe property names. Replace all unsafe characters with _ underscore.

parameters.name: $output
parameters.description: Return Logical or Display values in SLIM mode. Logical returns true/false for booleans, Display returns icon hints. Dates are always returned as ISO strings.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.description:
Calls the Sale agent service SaveSaleEntity.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category" Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

get.summary: Gets a SaleEntity object.
get.description:
Calls the Sale agent service GetSaleEntity.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the SaleEntity to return.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category" Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: fk
parameters.description: Load foreign keys on this entity into the ExtraFields property as 'app.device.keyname'='123' pairs.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

304.description: SaleEntity has not changed since the requested If-Modified-Since date.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The SaleEntity id to update.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category" Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

412.description: Update stopped because SaleEntity has changed since the requested If-Unmodified-Since timestamp.

400.description: Bad request. Entity to save is not in request body.

delete.description:
Calls the Sale agent service DeleteSaleEntity.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The SaleEntity to be deleted.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

412.description: Delete aborted because SaleEntity has changed since the requested If-Unmodified-Since timestamp.

parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

requestBody.description: Entity to be checked for errors.

Status.description: The state of the Sale: Open / Sold / Lost / Stalled

Probability.description: Actual probability, may differ from the one in the list

Completed.description: The Sale completed state. The completed state is either Started or Completed. NotStarted is treated as Started. The value maps to the Done database field.

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to sale, document, appointment.

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the sale.

NextDueDate.description: Next due date, this is a denormalization of 'closest future activity date, or most recent if no future activities'. Maintained by the system, but very convenient for searching.

Postit.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

ReopenDate.description: Date the sale is to be reopened; valid only for status=stalled. Not necessarily the same as the nextDueDate.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.description: Partial SaleEntity class associating the generated SaleEntity with an interface.

Type.description: The different types of appointment, if the appointment is supposed to be shown in the diary or checklist, or if it's a document. See the different types of appointments in the database manual.

Task.description: Task comprises the different types of activities, like “Phone call”, “Meeting” and so on.

AssociateFullName.description: The owner of the appointment - the associate whose diary/checklist the appointment is in.

ContactName.description: The contact associated with the appointment.

Description.description: The appointment's textbox; holds a descriptive text about the appointment. Filled out by the user.

PersonFullName.description: The full name of the person this appointment belongs to.

PersonId.description: Person ID of person the appointment is with, may be 0

ContactId.description: Contact ID of owning contact, may be 0

ProjectId.description: ID of project referred to, may be 0

ProjectName.description: The name of the project this appointment belong to. Blank if no project is connected.

IsPublished.description: True if appointment have an entry in published table

AssociateId.description: ID of associate whose diary the appointment is in, REQUIRED

ColorIndex.description: Appointment colour, used only in Japanese versions. Western versions take colour from Task

IsFree.description: True if free, false if busy

HasAlarm.description: Does this appointment have an alarm

Private.description: Obsolete, but still maintained field for appointment privacy; denormalization of visiblefor status

TaskType.description: The different task types of the appointment, if the activity is an appointment, task, phone. See the different types of appointments in the database manual.

IsBookingMain.description: True if this appointment is a booking and current associate is the owner. False if it is a booking and current associate is a participant.

IsRecurrence.description: True if the appointment is part of a recurring pattern.

IsBooking.description: True if this appointment is a booking.

ActiveDate.description: The date to be used for searching & showing

AssignmentStatus.description: Status if this appointment is in the process of being assigned to someone else

InvitationStatus.description: Status if this appointment represents an invitation

BookingType.description: The type of booking the appointment represents

MotherId.description: ID of mother appointment; self if booking master, master ID if booking slave, 0 if normal appointment. However, if 0 and assoc_id != reg_id then this is an assigned appointment, indicated vt type = kBooking

AssignedBy.description: Who (last) assigned this appointment to associate_id?

AssignedByFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

RejectReason.description: Why was this booking or assignment rejected, the RejectReason list is a source of suggestions but you can write anything here

Location.description: Location for appointment, defaulted from invited resource of type place and other rules, but you can write anything you want here

SaleName.description: Heading of Owning sale, if any. (may be blank)

CreatedBy.description: Who created the appointment. Associate name.

CreatedByFullName.description: Who created the appointment. Full name.

CreatedByAssociateId.description: Id of the associate that created the appointment

CautionWarning.description: Status field to indicate appointments that have some sort of problem

OwnedExternally.description: Set if an external system owns this appointment.

JoinVideomeetUrl.description: Blank when not a video meeting. Filled with Join Meeting URL when created.

PreferredTZLocation.description: Preferred timezone location to use when displaying/editing this appointment

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Appointment.description:
Simple read-only appointment data.
<para />
Carrier object for Appointment.
Services for the Appointment Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAppointmentAgent">Appointment Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

Name.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

PersonId.description:
Owning person record 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Type.description: User type - 1 = internal user, 2 = resource, 3 = external user, 4 = anonymous, 5 = system

GroupIdx.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

FullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

FormalName.description: The associate's culture formatted formalname (firstname, middleName and lastname, title, mrmrs)

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.description:
Carrier object for Associate.
Services for the Associate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAssociateAgent">Associate Agent</see>.

URL.description: The internet address to this contact

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

AssociateFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

CountryName.description: Name of country in installed language

FormattedAddress.description: The contact's address, formatted with linebreaks and spaces into a single string.

IsOwnerContact.description: Is the contact an owner contact.  This means that all persons on this contact can on only be internal users and not external users.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Contact.description:
Carrier object for Contact.
Services for the Contact Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

Wgs84Latitude.description: Latitude (that's north/south), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 59.91892. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

Wgs84Longitude.description: Longitude (that's East/west), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 10.73159. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

LocalizedAddress.description: LocalizedFieldArray is a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data.

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. Combines street and postal into one string. e.g.: <c>"Postboks 123,
Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Postbox 123,
Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
East Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Address.description:
Street and/or Postal address, in both formatted and structured forms. You only need to modify one of the two for the change to be registered.
<para />
Carrier object for Address.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LocalizedField.description:
LocalizedField is used to store localized information such as formatted address data, a formatted phone number, etc.
<para />
Carrier object for LocalizedField.

AtypeIdx.description: Bit mask, combines address type (EAddressType) and owner type (EOwnerType)

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. e.g.: <c>"Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
The Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.StructuredAddre.description:
Address with structured fields (Address1, City, Zip) - does not vary its layout by country, unliked the formatted address.
<para />
Carrier object for StructuredAddress.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Project.description:
Carrier object for Project.
Services for the Project Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IProjectAgent">Project Agent</see>.

Position.description: The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title

FullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

DirectPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the contact person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Retired.description: 1 = the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Rank.description: Display sort sequence for default sort order

ActiveInterests.description: Number of records in pintr table; select count(*) from pintr pi where pi.person_id = this.person_id == activeInterests is always true

FaxPhone.description: Returns the fax phone that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhone.description: Returns the mobile phone that belong to the contact person.

ContactPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the persons contact.

AssociateId.description: Id of the item's owner (Associate id)

UsePersonAddress.description: If 1, use person's address for mailing instead of company address

ContactFax.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

SupportAssociateId.description: Our support contact for this person

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

Carrier object for Person.
Services for the Person Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleStakeholder.description:
Carrier object for SaleStakeholder.
Services for the SaleStakeholder Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISaleAgent">Sale Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.VisibleFor.description:
Carrier object for VisibleFor.
Services for the VisibleFor Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISentryAgent">Sentry Agent</see>.

SuperOffice.Services.WebApi.OData.ODataS.description: Easy to use archive results - just a flat list of values.

Status.description: The state of the Sale: Open / Sold / Lost / Stalled

Probability.description: Actual probability, may differ from the one in the list

Completed.description: The Sale completed state. The completed state is either Started or Completed. NotStarted is treated as Started. The value maps to the Done database field.

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to sale, document, appointment.

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the sale.

NextDueDate.description: Next due date, this is a denormalization of 'closest future activity date, or most recent if no future activities'. Maintained by the system, but very convenient for searching.

Postit.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

ReopenDate.description: Date the sale is to be reopened; valid only for status=stalled. Not necessarily the same as the nextDueDate.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SaleEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.SaleCarri.description:
The Sale Entity contains the sale amount, currency, and sale members. Sales are linked to contacts, persons, and/or projects.
<para />
SaleEntity entity with API _Links added.

Probability.description: Actual probability, may differ from the one in the list

Currency.description: Currency the sale was made in.

Status.description: The sale's status, indicating wether the sale is open, sold or lost.

PersonFullName.description: The name of the person this sale belongs to.

Completed.description: The Sale completed state. The completed state is either Started or Completed. NotStarted is treated as Started. The value maps to the Done database field.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

NextDueDate.description: Next due date, this is a denormalization of 'closest future activity date, or most recent if no future activities'. Maintained by the system, but very convenient for searching.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Sale.description:
Carrier object for Sale.
Services for the Sale Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISaleAgent">Sale Agent</see>.

FieldType.description: What sort of data does this field contain. 1 = int, 2 = short text, ...

DisplayName.description: Label for field. May be multi-lang string encoded.

Description.description: Optional tooltip text for this field

ShortLabel.description: Short name to be used in Archive headings and on page 1. If blank, the fieldLabel will be used everywhere.

HideField.description: Hide the field from the UI. Only allow API access.

IsIndexed.description: Is this field indexed? 0 if no, index no. if yes

IsMandatory.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes (field must be filled out)

IsExternal.description: Should this field be shown to external users via customer center?

IsDisplayField.description: Flag indicating that this field is chosen as DisplayField for a table it belongs

Rank.description: Tab order, ranking within the custom fields.

TemplateVariableName.description: Template variable name: 'cs01', 'cl02' etc. Null for extra fields.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.FieldInfoBase.description:
Abstract basic information about database fields. May be custom or user-defined fields. The information can be used to build a user interface.
<para />
Carrier object for FieldInfoBase.
Services for the FieldInfoBase Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserDefinedFieldInfoAgent">UserDefinedFieldInfo Agent</see>.

ColumnId.description: The ID of the database column this field corresponds to

FieldDefault.description: Optional default value for String fields

FieldType.description: Field type: 0 = leadtext only, 1 = Edit, 2 = CheckBox, 3 = dropdown, 4 = listbox

FormatMask.description: Formatting mask, can be whatever the controls understand (currently nothing :-))

IsIndexed.description: Is this field indexed? 0 if no, index no. if yes

LastVersionId.description: UDefFieldId this field had in the previous version, 0 = field is new in this version

ListTableId.description: The table ID of the source table for lists: kTableAssoc, kTableContInt or whatever

IsMandatory.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes (field must be filled out)

Type.description: ID of owning table (contact, person, project) - this is not the actual tableNumber, rather it's an enum

Page1LineNo.description: Line no on View Page 1, used if MDO flags are OFF. 0 = this field is not visible on page 1

ProgId.description: Programmatic ID, for use by software that needs to find a particular field. Carried over like udefIdentity across generations. Use a Company.Product.Field format to avoid naming conflicts; the Company name SuperOffice is reserved.

ShortLabel.description: Short name to be used in Archive headings and on page 1. If blank, the fieldLabel will be used everywhere.

TabOrder.description: Tab order value, sets the field processing sequence

TextLength.description: Length (in characters) of a text field, 0 for other types

Tooltip.description: Optional tooltip text for this field

UdefIdentity.description: Unique number used to track field identity across layout changes

UDListDefinitionId.description: List to use for populating dropdown or listbox

Version.description: Definition version number; ALL fields get new version whenever layout is updated.

HasBeenPublished.description: Has the udef field been published?

MdoListName.description: MDO list name used to populate this list. Derived from UDListDefinitionId and ListTableId. (Read-only)

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserDefinedFiel.description:
Return information about the user defined fields. The information can be used to mirror the layout of the user-defined fields in the user interface.
<para />
Carrier object for UserDefinedFieldInfo.
Services for the UserDefinedFieldInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserDefinedFieldInfoAgent">UserDefinedFieldInfo Agent</see>.

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.
